meta.description: Lufthansa Business Lounge (Non-Schengen, Gates B44-B48) at Frankfurt Airport (FRA), Terminal 1, Concourse B. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Lufthansa Business Lounge (Non-Schengen, Gates B44-B48)

location.terminalDirections: After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B44-B48 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.

lounge.description: Relax at the Lufthansa Business Lounge prior to your non-Schengen departure from Frankfurt. Enjoy a comfortable, peaceful, and modern environment away from the terminal's hustle and bustle. Imbibe at the well-stocked self-serve bar and enjoy a delectable, nourishing meal from the buffet selection. Upgrade your pre-flight experience now.

general: Children under 2 years old are admitted free with an adult.
Lounge bookings for this location are limited to non-corporate use. A tax invoice (according to respective taxation laws of selected countries) will not be issued.
warning: This location does not accept passengers in airline uniforms.
regulatory: This lounge is only accessible for Terminal 1 passengers departing on non-Schengen flights from Concourse B. Passengers should leave sufficient time to reach their gates, as Frankfurt Airport is large and distances may be significant.
LoungeBuddy entries are not permitted during daily peak hours: 8:00 am - 1:30 pm.

LoungeBuddy bookings made for this lounge are NOT valid at any other Lufthansa Lounges located at Frankfurt Airport. Access will be denied if the booking is used at a different Lufthansa Lounge location.

reviews.content: Entrance at bottom of circular stairs. With Lufthansa tix day pass was 29 euro. Easy lockers, lovely interior (no daylight) room for nap, great breakfast including the best scrambled eggs ever üëç
Very few people here at 0530. Ten showers, all the amenities you would expect.
Really big, good food selection (though like what you know from Lufthansa Business, but tasty). I‚Äòm very happy here and will bookmark it for later ;)
They let me in with AMEX Platinum card and same day LH boarding pass departing from FRA.
Very nice and big lounge, a lot of people but not crowded at all (big...). Food is good, outstanding service, all very clean.
Lots of windows so light and bright. Good amount of seating and seating options. Light food (eggs (at breakfast time), croissants, fruit, meat, cheese)) and spirits, beer, wine. Not crowded.
The whole place is very spacious, rounded with a self-bar in the middle. Staff always available, not many food options, special booths for making calls, lockers. Wi-Fi 67,5 Mbit DL, 12,8 Mbit UL.

The staff has been very friendly, seat areas are very comfortable. The food has been delicious, at the moment they celebrate the Oktoberfest - so the food is themed. Also they offer freshly made wraps.
Had a 5 hour layover. This lounge was great! Had a shower, scrambled eggs and got to use wifi. Staff also brought around some complimentary bagels. I bought a pass for 25 euro. Well worth it!
Boo. I've been here several times before but the woman gatekeeper did not accept my United Club membership for entry. Spent almost two hours in another LH lounge earlier in the week, same card.
Outstanding lounge, great friendly staff, excellent food and drink, showers are great to relax. I will get back for sure.

We went out of our way to visit this lounge during a four hour layover in Frankfurt‚Ä¶ Very glad we did. Kids room is a game changer and my wife was able to take a nap in the sleeping room. Solid lounge.
Excellent large modern lounge with showers and good food selection.
Large contemporary style lounge. Lots of food and drinks to sample. Overall very clean and very attentive staff.
A nice and spacious Lufthansa lounge. The men's bathroom could use some fixing up. Food, seating and wifi is all great.

location.terminalDirections: Next to Gate A13, Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop.
Near Gate A26, proceed one level up to the entrance.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, next to Gate A13.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, towards Gate A50.
Located behind Airport Entrance 13 (Tor 13) when arriving by car.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B24-B28 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
Departure Area B, next to Gate B22.
Departure Area B, opposite Gate B42, next to Gate B43.
Outside of Passport Control and Security Checkpoint, Arrival Area B, immediately behind the Baggage Claim.
Landside, between Concourses B and C on the Gallery Level, next to the Travel Market (Reisemarkt).
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gates C14-C15.
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gate C14 and Gate C15.
Level 4, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
Level 3, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
